name: Intensity
description:
In intensity you can play solo or challenge a friend in a race in the dark. Every time you crash, you light up a portion of the level, thus making it easier for both yourself and your opponent.

Controls: press to rise, release to fall

Player 1: spacebar

Player 2: up arrow

Developed for Global Game Jam 2017 - Theme: Waves

Original page: https://globalgamejam.org/2017/games/intensity
